languages.text: "Праведные услышат истину в наших словах и не поддержат предателя! Если же мы оставим их в неведении, они станут его следующими жертвами!"
"The righteous will hear the truth in our words. They won't support the traitor! But if we leave them in the dark, they will become his next victims!"
languages.original_text: "Праведные услышат истину в наших словах и не поддержат предателя! Если же мы оставим их в неведении, они станут его следующими жертвами!"

traits.locale_text: "The righteous will hear the truth in our words, they won't support the traitor! But if we leave them in the dark, they will become his next victims!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “正义之人将会从我们的话中听到真相，他们绝不会支持叛徒！可如果我们把他们蒙在鼓里，他们就会成为政委接下来的受害者！”
languages.original_text: "The righteous will hear the truth in our words. They won't support the traitor! But if we leave them in the dark, they will become his next victims!"

traits.locale_text: “正义之人将会从我们的话中听到真相，他们绝不会支持叛徒！可如果我们把他们蒙在鼓里，他们就会成为政委接下来的受害者！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「正義の心を持つ者たちは私たちの言葉に真実を見出す。裏切り者の肩を持つはずがない！しかし、このままうやむやにすれば、彼らが次の犠牲者になってしまう！」
languages.original_text: "The righteous will hear the truth in our words. They won't support the traitor! But if we leave them in the dark, they will become his next victims!"

traits.locale_text: 「正義の心を持つ者たちは私たちの言葉に真実を見出す。裏切り者の肩を持つはずがない！しかし、このままうやむやにすれば、彼らが次の犠牲者になってしまう！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Los justos oirán la verdad de nuestras palabras. ¡No apoyarán al traidor! Pero, si los abandonamos en la ignorancia, ¡serán sus próximas víctimas!».
languages.original_text: "The righteous will hear the truth in our words. They won't support the traitor! But if we leave them in the dark, they will become his next victims!"

traits.locale_text: «Los justos oirán la verdad de nuestras palabras. ¡No apoyarán al traidor! Pero, si los abandonamos en la ignorancia, ¡serán sus próximas víctimas!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The righteous will hear the truth in our words. They won't support the traitor! But if we leave them in the dark, they will become his next victims!"

languages.text: « La vérité de nos paroles saura toucher les justes. Ils ne soutiendront pas un traître ! Mais si nous ne disons rien, ils seront ses prochaines victimes ! »
languages.original_text: "The righteous will hear the truth in our words. They won't support the traitor! But if we leave them in the dark, they will become his next victims!"

traits.locale_text: « La vérité de nos paroles saura toucher les justes. Ils ne soutiendront pas un traître ! Mais si nous ne disons rien, ils seront ses prochaines victimes ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Rechtschaffenen werden die Wahrheit in unseren Worten hören. Sie werden den Verräter nicht unterstützen! Aber wenn wir sie im Dunkeln lassen, werden sie seine nächsten Opfer!"
languages.original_text: "The righteous will hear the truth in our words. They won't support the traitor! But if we leave them in the dark, they will become his next victims!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Rechtschaffenen werden die Wahrheit in unseren Worten hören. Sie werden den Verräter nicht unterstützen! Aber wenn wir sie im Dunkeln lassen, werden sie seine nächsten Opfer!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "İnançlılar sözlerimizdeki gerçeği duyacaktır. Haine destek olmayacaklardır! Ancak onları bihaber bırakırsak bir sonraki kurbanları olacaklar!"
languages.original_text: "The righteous will hear the truth in our words. They won't support the traitor! But if we leave them in the dark, they will become his next victims!"

traits.locale_text: "İnançlılar sözlerimizdeki gerçeği duyacaktır. Haine destek olmayacaklardır! Ama onları bihaber bırakırsak, onun bir sonraki kurbanları onlar olacak!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
